backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme OKLCH color variables and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading SheetJS and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controller handling view switching, Excel parsing state, department/semester filtering, and analytics computation.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleBar: SVG bar chart rendering with dynamic width, scroll support, and basic labels.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleLin: SVG line chart with grid lines, labeled points, and responsive width.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimplePie: SVG pie chart computing slice angles and displaying a legend with percentages.
frontend/src/features/comparison/Semeste: Renders semester-to-semester analytics comparison with line charts and a detailed metrics table, including trend calculations and back navigation.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/BacklogD: Displays backlog groups with collapsible lists of students, allowing roll‑number selection and showing empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Semester: Main dashboard showing semester analytics, charts, subject failures, backlog distribution, student lookup, and department/semester filtering.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/StudentD: Shows a detailed academic record for a selected student, or an error panel if not found.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/StudentR: Provides a roll‑number search interface with results, department-aware warnings, and simple result display.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/SubjectA: Lists subjects ordered by backlog count with failed-student selectors and basic subject metadata.
frontend/src/features/upload/UploadScree: React component for uploading and parsing Excel files with drag‑and‑drop and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module reserved for future backend React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/analytics/backlogDistri: Computes backlog distribution groups by counting students with matching backlog counts.
frontend/src/lib/analytics/computeSemest: Generates per‑semester analytics including pass rates, backlog counts, and subject‑wise failures.
frontend/src/lib/analytics/subjectFailur: Builds a map of subjects to lists of students who failed them, sorted by roll number.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseExcelFile.ts: Parses Excel files via XLSX, detects long vs wide formats, and converts rows into structured ParsedData.
frontend/src/lib/format/numberFormat.ts: Utility functions to format numbers, percentages, and decimals safely.
frontend/src/lib/format/subjectAbbreviat: Empty test file for subject abbreviation utilities.
Generates subject name abbreviations and formats subject codes with those abbreviations.
frontend/src/lib/guards/assertions.ts: Assertion helpers ensuring defined values, non‑empty arrays, and valid numeric checks.
frontend/src/lib/state/appFlowTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for student records, parsed dataset structures, and semester analytics.
frontend/src/lib/students/lookupStudentR: Provides a function to look up students by roll number with normalized matching and returns matched records.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including schema version, features, issues, and new feature requests for project planning.
